page.title: 12Every day life
page.content: WHEN THE CORNER SHOP CLOSED DOWN WE HAD TO USE THE PAPER SHOP ON HIGHFIELD ROAD. ITS REALLY QUIET ROUND NEWBURY WAY EXCEPT FOR THE ALARM AT THE OLD MILL GOING OFF EVERYDAY WITH PEOPLE THROWING STONES AT THE WINDOWS,PEOPLE BREAKING IN,AND FIRES AT THE BACK OF IT.THE PETROL STATION IS NEXT DOOR TO THE MILL.THERE ARE CARS COMING IN EVERY-DAY THAT HAVE HAD A CRASH.AT NIGHT YOU CAN HARDLY GET TO SLEEP BECAUSE OF THE RESCUE CARS COMING IN WITH WRECKS AND PIECES OF CARS.AT THE BACK OF MY HOUSE IS A FIELD. AT THE END OF THE FIELD IS A STREET CALLED GORTON STREET ABOUT FIVE WEEKS AGO THEY KNOCKED IT DOWN. ALL THERE IS NOW IS BRICKS,RUBBLE AND DIRT.ON THE FIELD AT THE SIDE OF MY HOUSE THERE ARE GAMES PLAYED EVERYDAY WITH FOOTBALL MATCHES AND ROUNDERS MATCHES.
